test_scenarios.name: Successful Login
test_scenarios.expected_result: User is successfully logged in and redirected to their dashboard.

test_scenarios.name: Schedule a new appointment
steps: Navigate to https://www.onemedical.com after logging in.
Select appointment type, reason, date and time
test_scenarios.expected_result: Appointment is successfully scheduled, and user receives confirmation on the screen.

test_scenarios.name: Start a Virtual Care Visit
steps: Navigate to https://www.onemedical.com after logging in.
Initiate a new virtual care request
test_scenarios.expected_result: User is connected to a virtual care provider.

test_scenarios.name: Request a Prescription Refill
steps: Navigate to https://www.onemedical.com after logging in.
test_scenarios.expected_result: Refill request is successfully submitted and shows up under recent refill requests.

test_scenarios.name: View Medical Record
steps: Navigate to https://www.onemedical.com after logging in.
Select a record (e.g., lab result or visit summary)
test_scenarios.expected_result: The selected medical record is displayed correctly.
